title: R.I.P., Charmaine? Virgin River’s Lauren Hammersley Isn’t Too Hopeful About Her Character’s Season 7 Fate
description: When Jack arrived at Charmaine’s ransacked home in Virgin River‘s sixth season finale, I immediately feared the worst for Lauren Hammersley’s downtrodden character — and apparently I’m not the only one jumping to that conclusion.
